about + projects posts resume

Real-time Rendering Blogs

A collection of (mostly) rendering and game engine related blogs, in no specific order. I used to have a couple of these as RSS feeds on a now defunct feed aggregator, and until I take the time to input them all into a working one, this post will have to do. Please let me know of you know of any swell blog that are missing!

[Additions by Kyle Hayward, Kostas Anagnostou, Aras Pranckevičius, Tom Forsyth, Jhonny Göransson, @TheEpsylon, Dave Permen and Dan Parsonson.]

Industry People

  • Diary of a Graphics Programmer - Wolfgang Engel , ShaderX and GPU Pro books editor legend, currently CEO of Confetti.
  • Self Shadow - Stephen Hill , 3D Technical Lead at Ubisoft.
  • CodeItNow - Rory Driscoll , Lead Game Programmer at Sony Santa Monica.
  • repilogue - Johan Andersson , Software Architect in the Frostbite engine team at DICE.
  • markus buretorp - Markus Buretorp, Software Engineer at Machinegames.
  • humus - Emil Persson , Head of Research at Avalanche Studios.
  • beautifulpixels - Vincent Scheib , Games and Graphics Dev. Google Chrome Games.
  • Shawn Hargreaves Blog - Shawn Hargreaves , Works at Microsoft on Windows Phone.
  • direct to video - Matt Swoboda, aka Smash of demogroup Fairlight, developer at United Visual Artists.
  • Aras Blog - Aras Pranckevičius , Rendering dude at Unity Technologies.
  • Graphic Rants - Brian Karis , Senior Graphics Programmer at Epic Games.
  • Graphics Runner - Kyle Hayward , graphics programmer at EA Tiburon.
  • The Instruction Limit - Renaud Bédard , developer at CAPY GAMES.
  • DEADC0DE - c0de517e/AngeloPesce , Rendering Technical Director at Activision.
  • Jon Olicks Blog - Jon Olick , older blog, work at Red 5 Studios.
  • Deja VU - Daniel Collin , Sr Software Engineer on the Frostbite rendering team.
  • Joost’s Dev Blog - Joost van Dongen , lead programmer of Ronimo Games.
  • Timothy Lottes Blog - Timothy Lottes , render team at Epic.
  • Sébastien Lagarde - Sébastien Lagarde , senior rendering programmer at DICE.
  • cbloom rants - Charles Bloom, from RAD Game Tools.
  • el trastero - Iñigo Quilez , TD at Pixar.
  • TojiCode - Brandon Jones , Chrome WebGL developer at Google.
  • Industrial Arithmetic - Simon Green , Graphics programmer at NVIDIA
  • Light is Beautiful - Julien Guertault , Lead programmer at Gameloft Tokyo.
  • Miles Macklin’s Blog - Miles Macklin , physics programmer working for NVIDIA.
  • Stumbling Toward ‘Awesomeness’ - Christopher Evans, Art Technical Director at Crytek.
  • Syntopia - Mikael Hvidtfeldt Christensen , Senior Scientific Developer at CLC bio.
  • The Danger Zone - Matt Pettineo , graphics programmer at Ready At Dawn Studios.
  • The ryg Blog - Fabian Giesen , programmer at RAD Game Tools and member of demogroup farbrausch.
  • ZigguratVertigo’s Hideout - Colin Barré-Brisebois , senior graphics programmer at Warner Brothers Games Montréal.
  • I’m doing it wrong - Tom Madams, Software Engineer at Google.
  • Jorge Jimenez Real-Time Graphics R&D - Jorge Jimenez , Real-Time Graphics Researcher at Activision Blizzard.
  • Mikkelsen and 3D Graphics - Morten S. Mikkelsen, principal programmer at Crystal Dynamics.
  • Nathan Reed’s Blog - Nathan Reed , graphics programmer at NVIDIA.
  • Sebh’s Blog - Sébastien Hillaire , Rendering Engineer at DICE.
  • Steve McAuley Computer graphics in the real world - Steve McAuley , graphics programmer at Ubisoft Montreal.
  • Rastergrid Blogosphere - Daniel Rákos , Member of Technical Staff at AMD.
  • Martin Codes - Martin Ecker , principal graphics programmer at High Moon Studios.
  • spuify - Steven Tovey , endering APIs and Performance Tools at Sony Advanced Technology Group.
  • Interplay of Light - Kostas Anagnostou , senior graphics programmer at Radiant Worlds.
  • Solid Angle - Steve Anichini , Principal Graphics Programmer at Irrational Games.
  • Simon’s Graphics Blog - Simon Brown , PS4 graphics coder at Media Molecule.
  • Simon’s Tech Blog - Simon Yeung, Senior Game Programmer at Insoft Development Limited.
  • Blind Renderer - Pope Kim , Senior Rendering Programmer.
  • TomF’s Tech Blog - Tom Forsyth , Software Architect at Oculus VR.
  • Lia-Sae’s Blog - Amandine Coget , associate software engineer at DICE.
  • rgba32 - Mark Lee , Senior Software Engineer at DreamWorks Animation.
  • Yosoygames - Matías N. Goldberg , freelance software developer at Yosoygames.
  • Icare3D Blog - Cyril Crassin , research scientist at NVIDIA.
  • John Ratcliff’s Code Suppository - John Ratcliff , software engineer for NVIDIA.
  • Ramblings in Valve Time - Michael Abrash, Developer at Valve Software.
  • Procedural World - Miguel Cepero , developer and CEO at Voxel Farm.
  • Ray Tracey’s blog - Sam Lapere, Project Manager at OTOY New Zealand.
  • I-Novae Studios - Keith Newton , CEO at I-Novae Studios.
  • Pixelnerve - Victor Martins , graphics programmer at Pixelnerve.
  • John White 3D - John White , Senior Software Engineer at Black Tusk Studios.

Development Studios

  • bitsquid: development blog - Bitsquid , a Swedish game engine developer, founded by former lead engineers of Grin.
  • Unigine crew - Non-official blog of Unigine development crew .
  • Molecular Musings - Development blog of Molecule Engine, run by Stefan Reinalter .
  • NVIDIA Game & Graphics Development - Game & Graphics Development Blog on NVIDIA Developer Zone.

Books and Academic Related

  • Real-Time Rendering Blog - Blog for the book “Real-Time Rendering” by Tomas Akenine-Möller, Eric Haines and Naty Hoffman.
  • 3D Engine Design for Virtual Globes - Blog for the book “3D Engine Design for Virtual Globes” by Patrick Cozzi and Kevin Ring.
  • Casual Effects - Morgan McGuire , Associate Professor at Williams College.
  • Game Engine Architecture - Blog for the book “Game Engine Architecture” by Jason Gregory , Lead Programmer at Naughty Dog.
  • Voxelium - Attila Tamás Áfra , PhD student in computer science at Budapest University of Technology and Economics.
  • Pete Shirley’s Graphics Blog - Pete Shirley, Adjunct Professor at University of Utah.

Indie Game Dev

  • The Witness Development Blog - Indie game being developed partly by Jonathan Blow of Braid fame.
  • Wolfire Games - Wolfire Games , inde game developers creating their own engine and asset pipeline for their game Overgrowth.
  • Gamedev Coder Diary - Maciej Sawitus, indie game developer at Pixel Elephant.
  • COPYPASTEPIXEL - Stefan Kamoda, covering development of his game Rust and several rendering techniques (light volumes, global illumination etc).
  • Sander’s Blog - Sander van Rossen , developer of indie iOS game Zombie Gunship.

Miscellaneous

  • #AltDevBlog - Game dev blog of different authors with occasional rendering related posts, run by Harriet and Mike Acton .
  • Scali’s OpenBlog™ - Scali Bohemiq .
  • john-chapman-graphics - John Chapman.
  • FABIEN SANGLARD’S WEBSITE - Fabien Sanglard .
Posted on 2014 Jan 06
